input_text:
Job Title: Delivery Merchandiser Presales 5Day NU

Location: Capitol Heights, MD

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Sales

Description:
Requisition ID: 188518

Posting Locations: Capitol Heights

Pay Range: 145.00 - 150.00 , day rate + Commission

Rate Frequency: Daily

Click here to view a Day in the Life of our Teammates!

Our Secret Ingredient is our Teammates. 

We offer great rewards , competitive pay , career advancement and growth opportunities .

Full Time Teammates are also eligible for:

 Paid Training  Paid Time Off plus paid holidays  401(k) with Company matching on a dollar-for-dollar basis  Employee Stock Purchase Plan (ESPP)  Group Health Insurance – Medical, Dental, Vision & Disability  Basic and Supplemental Life Insurance 


Refresh and Grow your Career with Us!

Job Overview

A Delivery Merchandiser, Home Market is part of CCCI's Direct Store Delivery (DSD) system and may be assigned one of the following route types Tel-Sell, or Sideload/CooLift/OFS. This is a physical and fast-paced role is responsible for the efficient and effective delivery, unloading, and merchandising our products at customer account locations according to CCCI standards; stocking and facing products on shelves, displays, and in coolers.

Duties & Responsibilities

Deliver, unload, merchandise, and rotate product in assigned accounts to CCCI and customer standards (e.g., filling shelves and coolers, stocking displays, rotating products, removing out of date and damaged products)Organize and maintain back room by stacking and arranging products neatly and organized in the designated areaEnsure neat appearance of all CCCI equipment and product in assigned accountsFoster relationship with account personnel and provides superior customer service to all accounts serviced.Maintain safe working environment and CCCI quality assurance standards at every accountEnsure proper accounting of product, cash, and assets dailyPerform other duties as assigned


Knowledge, Skills, & Abilities

Excellent customer service skillsMust be self-motivated with a high degree of integrity and be able to perform job duties with minimal supervision on a timely basisPast job performance must reflect dependability, initiative, professional demeanor, and the ability to exercise sound judgmentAbility to work in a fast-paced continuous lifting environmentAbility to lift to 75 lbs. of product repetitivelyAvailability to work some weekends and some holidaysPrevious route delivery, direct store delivery, stocking, merchandising products, or retail management experience is strongly preferred


Minimum Qualifications

Ability to obtain CDL permit and the ability to pass and maintain D.O.T. physical requirements

Preferred Qualifications

Previous route delivery, direct store delivery, stocking, merchandising products or retail management experienceCommercial Driver's License (CDL)


Work Environment

Work environment will vary, including but not limited to exposure to weather conditions, coolers, and customer storage areas which may be non-temperature controlled

Coca-Cola Consolidated, Inc. is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, or status as a protected veteran.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
